is stepping down as the company's chief executive. Company co-founder Larry Page will become CEO, effective April 4. At the same time, Google said that Larry Page 's co-founder Sergey Brin , will henceforth concentrated on strategic projects, in particular working on new products. network show called " Oprah Winfrey Presents Master Class" delves into Simon Cowell 's childhood and gives him a chance to reflect on why he has become so successful.
